attributes.action: prevent ISLAM4UK marching in Wooton Basset
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is not anti-muslim.
It is not racist.
It simply requests that the application for the extremist group ISMLAM4UK to march through Wooton Bassett is rejected and that all power is undtaken to stop this group from disrespecting our nations fallen troops.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
